name: repatch
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to add another patch (= a small program that makes an existing program work as it should) to a computer program: If you try to re-patch the program while it's live, the whole system will crash. I repatched the application data and the site worked for a few days, but it's failing again now.
More examplesFewer examplesIt's time to re-patch with some additional clean-ups for good measure.I think we need to repatch it, or we'll have hundreds of users complaining that it doesn't work.Let's repatch it straight away and test-publish the site tomorrow.
